official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress regarding the semiannual cost-of-living adjustments for Civil Service and military retirees.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that reconciliation instructions directing various congressional committees to achieve legislative savings shall not apply to semiannual cost-of-living adjustments for civil service and military retirees.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress regarding the semiannual cost-of-living adjustments for Civil Service and military retirees.
